import React from "react"; import { Container,Col,Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Favoruite = () =>{ const fav = useSelector((state) => state.cart.fav) return(
{fav.length === 0? (

No Favourites Added
):(
{fav.map((fav) => (

{fav.name}

${fav.price}
))}
)}
) } export default Favoruite;
